body_html:
It's not working for multiple inputs. With small changes in the code, torchsummary.py, it works for multiple inputs.

instead of

model(x)

using

        if isinstance(input_size[0], (list, tuple)):
        	model(*x)
        else:
        	model(x)

works. Since the inputs, if multiple, is stored as a list.

body:
It's not working for multiple inputs. With small changes in the code, torchsummary.py, it works for multiple inputs. 

instead of 

`model(x)`

using

```python
        if isinstance(input_size[0], (list, tuple)):
        	model(*x)
        else:
        	model(x)
```
works. Since the inputs, if multiple, is stored as a list.
